title: Leading brands on Facebook from Indonesia 2017 , by number of fans
yAxis: Number of fans on Facebook in millions
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions 19.99 is found at Month Mario Teguh and the minimum is found at Liputan6 where Month is 8.19.
There is a difference of 11.8 between the maximum Month Mario Teguh and minimum Month Liputan6.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions 19.99 is found at Month Mario Teguh and the minimum is found at Liputan6 where Month is 8.19.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions 19.99 is found at Month Mario Teguh and the minimum is found at Liputan6 where Month is 8.19.
There is a difference of 11.8 between the maximum Month Mario Teguh and minimum Month Liputan6.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions 19.99 is found at Month Mario Teguh and the minimum is found at Liputan6 where Month is 8.19.
Second maximum Number of fans on Facebook in millions is found at Month DRAWING PENCIL.
The highest Month Mario Teguh has 11.8 more Number of fans on Facebook in millions than the lowest Month Liputan6.
Month Mario Teguh is higher than any other Months with value 19.99, followed by DRAWING PENCIL, and Kompas.com. Down to Month Liputan6 with the lowest value 8.19.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions has reduced over the past 10 Months.
The average Number of fans on Facebook in millions in all 10 Months is 10.65.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is 106.49 if we add up values of all Months.
